response.overview: Film is about Jhilabaai .Tribal Leader the poet &organic intellectual. She is 86 years old .She is not educated even. But revolution is in her blood. She is the fighter. She fought for her land,Jungle and natural resources,along with her people. She fights with government and pass the law for tribal. Along with her story we understand the standard of living of these people their struggle,their history. And ultimately they win the battle,but on personal level Jhilabaai is very upset with non- active government. And she feels cheated as a civilian of this country.
response.title: Aamo Akha Ek Se
